title: Topic 002 Question 061
body: You have the Azure virtual networks shown in the following table.
You deploy Azure Firewall to Vnet3.
You need to ensure that the traffic from Subnet1-1 to Subnet2-1 passes through the firewall.
options: peering links between Vnet1 and Vnet2
a route table associated to Subnet1-1 and Subnet2-1
a route table associated to AzureFirewallSubnet
